ProductInfo.Features:
2.8-inch TFT LCD display
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. Unlocked Quad Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 mHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
2 MP Camera; 20 MB Internal Memory Storage and MicroSD Slot up to 4GB; Social Networking (Facebook/Twitter/Myspace/Orkut/Picassa/Flicker); MP3/MP4 Player; FM Radio; 3.5 MM Jack and MP3 Ringtones.
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g; Bluetooth v2.0 with A2DP; JAVA MIDP 2.1; Anti-theft Mobile Tracker; NDTV Active; Browser WAP 2.0/xHTML; with 256K colors and MicroUSB v2.0.
Talk time up to 3 h 30 min - Standby up to 296 h
ProductInfo.Name: LG T310i Cookie Style GSM Unlocked Phone with 2 MP Camera, Full Touch Screen, MP3/MP4 Player, FM Radio and Wi-Fi - Black - US Warranty
